org.ibmstreams.bigsql.hbase

Class PutRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ibmstreams.bigsql.hbase.PutRow

extends java.lang.Object
    Author:

    Package to put row into HBase. Supports batch insert.

      • flushR

        public void flushR()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Flushes buffer to HBase. If buffer empty then does nothing.

      • PutR

        public void PutR(ColumnsDef c,
                 RowsVals r)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Put single row into HBase. Flushes to HBase only if buffer size overflows.
        Parameters:
        c - HBase column mapping
        r - Row of value corresponding to c list
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
